author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
This pull request collects the updates to the HLT Run2 menus integrated after CMSSW_7_4_0_pre9, and meant for the final CMSSW_7_4_0

List of changes applied with respect to the menus merged in CMSSW_7_4_0_pre9:

=== Frozen menus as the top developments of the following

=== Add paths for MC studies of the HLT objects to both 25ns and 50ns tables

=== 50ns:
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V29: Fix L1 seeds for RPC AlCa, as in a late request from CMSHLT-231
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V26: Change of isolation cone to R=0.2 for lepton+HT+[MET,b-tag] triggers, CMSHLT-311
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V24: Include 4 new HLT paths for the all hadronic ttH(bb) analysis, CMSHLT-309
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V23: Addition and modification of SUSY lepton auxiliary triggers, CMSHLT-293
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V22: Fix ncand multiplicity in a few single and multiple electron filters
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V21: Finish integrating CMSHLT-285, with renamed PFJet paths and modules
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V20: Change L1 seeds for EXO triggers at 50ns, CMSHLT-293
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V19: Rename a few L1s modules in a more conventional way
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/50nsHLT/V17: Migrate to CMSSW_7_4_0_pre9

=== 25ns:
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/HLT/V78: Fix L1 seeds for RPC AlCa, as in a late request from CMSHLT-231
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/HLT/V77: Change of isolation cone to R=0.2 for lepton+HT+[MET,b-tag] triggers, CMSHLT-311
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/HLT/V75: Include 4 new HLT paths for the all hadronic ttH(bb) analysis, CMSHLT-309
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/HLT/V74: Addition and modification of SUSY lepton auxiliary triggers, CMSHLT-293
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/HLT/V70: Fix ncand multiplicity in a few single and multiple electron filters
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/HLT/V69: Rename a few L1s modules in a more conventional way
/dev/CMSSW_7_4_0/HLT/V68: Migrate to CMSSW_7_4_0_pre9
title: HLT updates after 740pre9
